name: Bishop.ROM
description:
Context!
You begin a new life in a small town in England. You stumble across an old terminal up inside the study room.
When activating this old terminal you appear in a text adventure game. You must beat the entity's challenges before the time runs out to return to your new life.

Controls:
go (direction) - will take you to places that are highlighted
use (item) - will use an item if you can. This item will have to be in your inventory
take (item) - will place the item into your inventory
examine (item) - will examine the item
inventory - will display inventory

This game was made by :
Jacob Morgan
Raine Reynolds-Osborne
Lukas Trisauskas

For the University of Lincoln Orientation Week Jam 2020
